messages.message: I am seeing this issue with the Gdrive mount on AIHub

Here is the full error.
```[INTERNAL]: Failed to retrieve ID for root folder (Err: Get \"https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3/files/root?alt=json\u0026prettyPrint=false\": oauth2: cannot fetch token: 401 Unauthorized```
It seems like Instabase is no longer authorized to access your Google Drive, @Mitch Welzen.

To unblock yourself, you can mount your drive using a different name and use it.

To help investigate, can you provide any info that can help root cause the issue:
1. When did you mount this drive?
2. Do you remember revoking access to the Instabase app on Google Drive?
